Sentencas: Ce0.8Sm0 15R0.05O2-delta (R = Sm, Mg, Ca, Sr, and Ba) specimens were successfully prepared using a solid-state reaction, and they were used in an intermediate temperate solid oxide fuel cell (IT-SOFC) electrolyte.
Titulo: The microstructures and property analysis of aliovalent cations (Sm3+, Mg2+, Ca2+, Sr2+, Ba2+) co-doped ceria-base electrolytes after an aging treatment

Sentencas: This study focused on the effects of co-doping and an aging treatment for the conductivities and microstructures of CeO2-based ceramics and also analyzed the variation of the conductivity in the reducing atmosphere.
Titulo: The microstructures and property analysis of aliovalent cations (Sm3+, Mg2+, Ca2+, Sr2+, Ba2+) co-doped ceria-base electrolytes after an aging treatment

Sentencas: The study showed that the conductivities of the CeO2-based materials have a higher conductivity at 500-800 degrees C by the co-doping aliovalent cations Sm and R. The conductivity increased with the increasing oxygen vacancies that were induced from charge.
Titulo: The microstructures and property analysis of aliovalent cations (Sm3+, Mg2+, Ca2+, Sr2+, Ba2+) co-doped ceria-base electrolytes after an aging treatment
The microstructures and property analysis of aliovalent cations (Sm3+, Mg2+, Ca2+, Sr2+, Ba2+) co-doped ceria-base electrolytes after an aging treatment

Sentencas: The XRD and EDS analyses showed that the MgO and BaCeO3 phases appeared in the Ce0.8Sm0 15Mg0.05O2-delta and Ce0.8Sm0 15Ba0.05O2-delta specimens, respectively.
Titulo: The microstructures and property analysis of aliovalent cations (Sm3+, Mg2+, Ca2+, Sr2+, Ba2+) co-doped ceria-base electrolytes after an aging treatment

Sentencas: The conductivity of the Ce0.8Sm0 15Ca0.05O2-delta specimens was higher, approximately 0.0837 S/cm at 800 C in the air.
Titulo: The microstructures and property analysis of aliovalent cations (Sm3+, Mg2+, Ca2+, Sr2+, Ba2+) co-doped ceria-base electrolytes after an aging treatment

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) in all samples was ca.
Titulo: The microstructures and property analysis of aliovalent cations (Sm3+, Mg2+, Ca2+, Sr2+, Ba2+) co-doped ceria-base electrolytes after an aging treatment
The microstructures and property analysis of aliovalent cations (Sm3+, Mg2+, Ca2+, Sr2+, Ba2+) co-doped ceria-base electrolytes after an aging treatment

Sentencas: After an aging treatment at 700 degrees C for a holding time of 1000 h, the conductivities of all samples showed almost no change.
Titulo: The microstructures and property analysis of aliovalent cations (Sm3+, Mg2+, Ca2+, Sr2+, Ba2+) co-doped ceria-base electrolytes after an aging treatment

Sentencas: However, the conductivity in Ce0.8Sm0 15Ca0.05O2-delta decreased from 0.0837 to 0.0581 S/cm, and the grain size increased.
Titulo: The microstructures and property analysis of aliovalent cations (Sm3+, Mg2+, Ca2+, Sr2+, Ba2+) co-doped ceria-base electrolytes after an aging treatment

Sentencas: The conductivities of the CeO2-based specimens were also measured under a 5%H-2-95%N-2 atmosphere, and the conductivity greatly increased in the reducing atmosphere because the Ce4+ ions reduced to Ce3+ ions.
Titulo: The microstructures and property analysis of aliovalent cations (Sm3+, Mg2+, Ca2+, Sr2+, Ba2+) co-doped ceria-base electrolytes after an aging treatment
